name: postman-qa-portfolio
description: Professional QA Automation Portfolio - API Testing

scripts.test:reqres: newman run "collections/01 - ReqRes API Testing.postman_collection.json" -e "environments/ReqRes - Production.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export newman-reports/ReqRes_Report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "ReqRes API - Automated Test Report" --reporter-htmlextra-browserTitle "ReqRes API Testing" --reporter-htmlextra-titleSize 4 --reporter-htmlextra-showEnvironmentData
scripts.test:dummyjson: newman run "collections/02 - DummyJSON E-commerce - Complete Testing.postman_collection.json" -e "environments/DummyJSON - Production.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export newman-reports/DummyJSON_Report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "DummyJSON E-commerce - Full QA Automation Report" --reporter-htmlextra-browserTitle "DummyJSON QA Report" --reporter-htmlextra-titleSize 4 --reporter-htmlextra-showEnvironmentData
scripts.test:contract: newman run "collections/03 - Contract Testing & JSON Schema Validation.postman_collection.json" -e "environments/DummyJSON - Production.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export newman-reports/Contract_Report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "Contract Testing & Schema Validation Report" --reporter-htmlextra-browserTitle "Contract Testing Report" --reporter-htmlextra-titleSize 4 --reporter-htmlextra-showEnvironmentData
scripts.test:graphql: newman run "collections/04 - GraphQL API Testing.postman_collection.json" -e "environments/GraphQL - SpaceX.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export newman-reports/GraphQL_Report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "GraphQL API - SpaceX Data Testing Report" --reporter-htmlextra-browserTitle "GraphQL API Testing" --reporter-htmlextra-titleSize 4 --reporter-htmlextra-showEnvironmentData
scripts.test:all-parallel: concurrently "npm run test:reqres" "npm run test:dummyjson" "npm run test:contract" "npm run test:graphql"

author: Juan Pablo Rivera Portilla
